title: This assignment tests you on how to create string object and convert string objects to different data types like Integer, float,etc.

questionText.text:
Given an String, Write a java method that returns the decimal value for the given binary string.
binaryToDecimal(“1010”) → 10
binaryToDecimal(“10000000000”) → 1024
binaryToDecimal(“111111111111111”) → 32767
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
